definition: the Second (of numbered kings)/second generation (e.g. Chinese Americans)
Qin Ershi (229-207 BC), second Qin emperor
Second World (Cold War-era term referring to communist nations as a bloc)

sentences.english: He spoke out against the excesses of King Edward II.
sentences.chinese: 他公然反對國王愛德華二世的暴政。

sentences.english: In the second century Galen pinned it on a dryness of the tongue.
sentences.chinese: 二世紀時，蓋倫將口喫歸咎於舌頭乾燥。

sentences.english: England under George II was prosperous.
sentences.chinese: 喬治二世統治下的英國繁榮昌盛。

sentences.english: Polish Pope John Paul II then pledged his obedience to the Freemasons.
sentences.chinese: 波蘭籍的約翰保羅二世隨後宣誓對共濟會效忠。

sentences.english: Even in the most extreme case imaginable, John Paul II's church was immoveable.
sentences.chinese: 即使是最極端的情況，保羅二世的教會也不爲所動。

sentences.english: Britain's Queen Elizabeth II is ranked 12.
sentences.chinese: 英女王伊麗莎白二世僅排第12位。

sentences.english: Queen Elizabeth Ⅱ was throned in 1952.
sentences.chinese: 英國女王伊麗莎白二世於1952年登上王位。

sentences.english: Alexander II is very clear, if not abandoned the small profits, then the Italian there is no guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 亞歷山大二世很清楚，若不棄小利，則大利難保。

sentences.english: Henry II was so angry that he drove Becket in to exile.
sentences.chinese: 亨利二世非常憤怒，就流放了貝克特。

sentences.english: Yi, How to Say 2nd Generation in Chinese?
sentences.chinese: 易，“二世”在中文裏面怎麼說？

sentences.english: President Hu and Queen Elizabeth II cut ribbon for the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤主席同伊麗莎白二世女王爲文物展開幕剪綵。

sentences.english: In honor of George II of Engloned.
sentences.chinese: 懷想英國的喬治二世皇帝。

sentences.english: Macaulay represents Charles II as a faithless fanatic.
sentences.chinese: 麥考萊把查理二世描寫爲無信義的狂熱者。

sentences.english: Elizabeth II now has rebuilt that bridge.
sentences.chinese: 伊麗莎白二世現在已改建的橋樑。

sentences.english: Albert II fully agreed with Hu on his remarks over bilateral relations.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾貝二世表示完全同意胡錦濤對兩國關係的評價。

sentences.english: St. Valentine was a priest in Rome at the time of Emperor Claudius II.
sentences.chinese: 聖瓦倫丁是克勞迪亞斯二世任羅馬皇帝時的一位牧師。

definition: the fifth (of series of numbered kings)
